mapper.select: select tsmi.id as id, tsmi.pid as pid, tsmi.title as title, tsmi.icon as icon, tsmi.href as href, tsmi.target as target from t_sys_menu_info tsmi left join t_role_menu trm on trm.menu_id=tsmi.id left join t_role_user tru on tru.role_id=trm.role_id where tsmi.pid=#{pId} and tru.user_id=#{userId}
